name: Rush and Roll
description:
Rush and Roll is a 3D game where players take a journey through a wonderful landscape to gain as many coins as they can. Sounds easy? You wish! While rolling, the ball smashes into obstacles. Try to come over the obstacles to get to the end. Where's the end? Who knows. Download the game and challenge yourself.

Gather coins and then spend them on making your world even better. Buy new levels to make your gaming environment diverse and exciting.

Rush and Roll game will fit any age. Train your skills to manage the speed of the ball and gather more coins to succeed.

Features:
- All-new ball run adventure
- Vibrant graphics
- Cool and endless gameplay
- Possibility to upgrade levels and diversity of the game elements.
